definition[0]: a situation in which countries outside the US want to use the dollar rather than their own country’s money
definition[1]: when people in countries outside the US prefer to use the dollar, rather than their country’s own currency
example[0]: High inflation has led many Russians to hold US dollars rather than roubles. This dollarisation is only now starting to reverse.
definition[2]: when a country makes its currency the same value as the dollar, or keeps its currency at the same rate in relation to the dollar
